column3: str
Chambui is in need of meat.
Slay steppe dzos and obtain their meat.
Speak with Chambui.
Deliver the chunks of steppe dzo meat to Chambui's husband.
Report to Chambui.
Fancy doing some hunting for me?
I have been so busy trading today that I have had no time to go hunting. Which is an issue as I am nearly out of buuz ingredients.
I would like you to slay four steppe dzos for me and bring back their meat. You should be able to find some just outside of Reunion.
We are far too busy today. I am struggling to keep up.
Do you have my meat?
We Dazkar are somewhat different to the other tribes in that all our hunting is done by our women. My little girls are already proving to be quite skilled with a bow and arrow.
I am sorry to take even more of your time, but could you deliver the dzo meat to my husband? You will find him just behind that nearby tent.
Why, hello! Can I help you with something?
Ah, you have been hunting for my wife have you? You have my thanks.
I must say it is quite nice to have the chance to speak with someone that does not belong to my tribe!
I would love to talk more, but it is really time I got back to cooking. Speak with my wife and I am sure she will see you are rewarded for your hard work.
I would love to talk more, but I really need to focus on cooking. Speak with my wife and I am sure she will see you are rewarded for your hard work.
You may not be aware of this, but those from outside our tribe seldom have the chance to speak with Dazkar men.

Usually we keep our men at home, but my husband's buuz are so much better than anything I could make. I felt I would be depriving my customers if I did not give them the opportunity to sample his cooking.
Regardless, it is time I got back to work. Thank you for all you have done.
